titleStmt.title: All for love, or, The world well lost a tragedy, as it is acted at the Theatre-Royal, and written in imitation of Shakespeare's stile / written by Mr. Dryden.
titleStmt.author: Dryden, John, 1631-1700.
Shakespeare, William, 1564-1616. Antony and Cleopatra.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for H. Herringman, and sold by R. Bently, J. Tonson, F. Saunders, and T. Bennet,

notesStmt.note: Based on Shakespeare's Anthony and Cleopatra.
